Instruction: Mix the flour, 2 tablespoons of salt, and 2 tablespoons of pepper in a bowl. In another bowl, beat the eggs, and whisk in the milk, 1 teaspoon of salt, and 1 teaspoon of pepper until well combined.
Heat oil in a deep fryer or a large saucepan to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
Dip cucumber slices in beaten egg, then coat with flour. Fry in hot oil until golden brown on both sides. Drain on paper towels for 5 minutes before serving.
